location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Tracing of a sketch map of Abu Musa Island

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Tracing on paper with additions in red ink and pencilDimensions:344 x 210 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by contours.Tracing of a sketch map of Abu Musa Island showing the iron oxide mine, an excavation site on the seashore, pier and anchorage.
